NCI DHCP Callback function. This function is called by the device when an IP was acquired using DHCP.

parameterdescription.para: Enumeration element containing the IP return status.

briefdescription.para: Local function for scanning networks. This function also calls the SetAndGetIp function in order to set/get IP settings and connect/disconnect from a network.

listitem.para: disconnects from a network if connected
sets an IP (either static or DHCP),

detaileddescription.para: Macro used for delay function for 15 seconds
Macro used for delay function for 0,5 seconds
Macro for wlan event timeout for simplelink

briefdescription.para: Wlan Network Management demonstrates how to use the XDK WLAN Abstraction to scan for networks, join networks, set a static IP address or dynamically obtain an IP address via DHCP.

detaileddescription.para:
This application does the following:
scans for networks
set an IP (either static or DHCP)
connects to a known WPA network
disconnects after a few seconds
This cycle repeats over and over until the OS timer expires.
